"Open Parties":
"\"Open\" is an optional party setting you can choose when selecting a quest at the Quest Counter.

When your party is Open, partner characters may be automatically removed to make space for new players who want to join. Be careful with this feature if you currently have in-progress Client Orders that require you to use a specific partner."
"To set your party to Open, select \"Open\" from the party settings when starting a new quest at the Quest Counter."
